entry.string: Administration - TinyMCE
entry.translation: Edmeenistreshun - TeenyMCE

entry.string: Overview
entry.translation: Oferfeeoo

entry.string: What is it?
entry.translation: Vhet is it?

entry.string: TinyMCE is a platform independent web based Javascript HTML WYSIWYG editor control released as Open Source under LGPL by Moxiecode Systems AB.
entry.translation: TeenyMCE is a pletffurm independent veb besed Jefescreept HTML VYSIVYG ideetur cuntrul releesed es Oopee Suoorce-a under LGPL by Muxeeecude-a Systems EB.

entry.string: It has a number of nice features over othe similar editors, and has multiple browser support, currently Mozilla, MSIE and FireFox. For futher details see
entry.translation: It hes a noomber ooff neece-a feetoores oofer oozee seemiler ideeturs, und hes moolteeple-a brooser sooppurt, coorrently Muzeella, MSIE und FureFux. Fur foozeer deteeels see

entry.string: The Xaraya TinyMCE module is currenly not much more than a wrapper for TinyMCE. This module brings the beginnings of configuration options via a user interface in the Xaraya Administration area for TinyMCE, once it is installed.
entry.translation: Zee Xereya TeenyMCE mudoole-a is coorrenly nut mooch mure-a thun a vrepper fur TeenyMCE. Thees mudoole-a breengs zee begeennings ooff cunffeegooreshun oopshuns feea a user interffece-a in zee Xereya Edmeenistreshun erea fur TeenyMCE, oonce-a it is instelled. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: How to use it?
entry.translation: Hoo tu use-a it?

entry.string: Install this module like you would any other Xaraya module. That is:
entry.translation: Instell thees mudoole-a leeke-a yuoo vuoold uny oozeer Xereya mudoole-a. Thet is:

entry.string: put the tinymce folder in your Xaraya modules directory
entry.translation: poot zee teenymce-a fulder in yuoor Xereya mudooles durectury

entry.string: go to the Adminpanel menu -> Modules -> View All
entry.translation: gu tu zee Edmeenpunel menoo -> Mudooles -> Feeoo Ell

entry.string: Click on the "install" link of the tinymce module
entry.translation: Cleeck oon zee "instell" leenk ooff zee teenymce-a mudoole

entry.string: The TinyMCE editor is not turned on by default. Once the tinymce module is installed it needs to be turned on. To do this:
entry.translation: Zee TeenyMCE ideetur is nut toorned oon by deffoolt. Um de hur de hur de hur. Oonce-a zee teenymce-a mudoole-a is instelled it needs tu be-a toorned oon. Bork bork bork! Tu du thees:

entry.string: go to the Adminpanels menu -> Base -> Modify Config
entry.translation: gu tu zee Edmeenpunels menoo -> Bese-a -> Mudeeffy Cunffeeg

entry.string: choose the tab "Other"
entry.translation: chuuse-a zee teb "Oozeer"

entry.string: on the wysiwyg editor dropdown choose "tinymce" as the default editor
entry.translation: on zee vyseevyg ideetur drupdoon chuuse-a "teenymce-a" es zee deffoolt ideetur

entry.string: In order to make modules in Xaraya use the tinymce module to display wysiwyg, you need to add the following snippet at the top of any of your page templates. eg usually this is default.xt in themes/yourtheme/pages directory. You may have more than one page template and can choose to add it to one or more.
entry.translation: In oorder tu meke-a mudooles in Xereya use-a zee teenymce-a mudoole-a tu deespley vyseevyg, yuoo need tu edd zee fullooeeng sneeppet et zee tup ooff uny ooff yuoor pege-a templetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! ig usooelly thees is deffoolt. Um de hur de hur de hur.xt in zeemes/yuoorzeeme-a/peges durectury. Bork bork bork! Yuoo mey hefe-a mure-a thun oone-a pege-a templete-a und cun chuuse-a tu edd it tu oone-a oor mure-a.

entry.string: Included Blocks
entry.translation: Inclooded Blucks

entry.string: There are no included blocks
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks

entry.string: Included Hooks
entry.translation: Inclooded Huuks

entry.string: There are no included hooks
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks

entry.string: And more.. [for module developers]
entry.translation: Und mure-a.. [fur mudoole-a defelupers]

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here.
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a.
